items.text: goes wider of off and turning away, Shakib wanted to slap that away but doesn't connect
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: waits for this one and strokes it through cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: cut to deep point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: he's been wanting to go after Nurse and finally gets one. Too short and it sat up, he rocked back and pulled it high and handsome over deep midwicket
items.postText: The ball's disappeared it looks like, so new balls coming out.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, tapped to mid-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: inside edges attempted cover drive
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: down the track, converts it to a full toss and smacks it past the bowler, but not timed perfectly. Long on runs to his right to collect
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: worked to square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle, gets nicely behind it and punches to long on
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: stepped out again but the ball was dipping on him, he gets it off the bottom half of the bat. It hit Tamim's bat on the non-striker's end on the way to long-on
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pushed to point
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, he swivels and pulls from below the waist to deep square leg
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: angled in, but ends up on the pads, flicked off his toes
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: smacked. Disdainful almost. Gabriel dug it in short and Shakib pulled it with great force and timing, sending it screaming to the square leg boundary
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: angling too far and on the pads again, picked off to fine leg, where the man is square and has to run to his left to collect
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: good length outside off, steered to point
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: straying on the pads again, and is flicked fine, but the man has moved finer so only a single
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Suhel: "This tape incident remind me only one back story that happened with legendary Sir Ambrose asked to remove the hand band.. and then rest is history.. poor Dean Jones..!!" - an iconic moment, that. Somehow, I don't think Nurse will be bowling thunderbolts to the batsmen's throats though...
items.text: tossed up, but dipping on him, he steps out and almost turns it into a yorker. Dug back to the bowler
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: stays back to cut this but only finds point
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: down the track but Chase shortens his length and he can't get it away, hits his pad and rolls into the legside
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: pushed past cover
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: stifled appeal, dipped and hurried on to him and hit his pad, defeating the push, but going down leg probably
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tapped to mid-off
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Saoirse: "So Bangladesh got hammered by the Irish 2nd XI, Windies beat Ireland and Bangladesh are now cruising against WI... cricket is a weird game"
items.text: good line, in the corridor and on a length, Shakib has a waft at it and misses
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tailing into the pads again, he's been very inconsistent with his lines. Shakib misses the flick, but they get a leg-bye to short fine leg
items.shortText: Gabriel to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 leg bye
